title: Redis Launches Vector Sets and a New Tool for Semantic Caching of LLM Responses
author: Frederic Lardinois
description: Redis today announced two new products: LangCache for caching LLM responses and vector sets, a new data type in Redis for storing and querying embeddings.
cntitle: Redis 发布向量集和用于 LLM 响应语义缓存的新工具
cndescription: Redis 今天宣布了两款新产品：用于缓存 LLM 响应的 LangCache 和向量集，这是一种 Redis 中用于存储和查询嵌入的新数据类型。
